snippet: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray says he is unlikely to play in Britain's Davis Cup quarter-final clash in Serbia this weekend but could travel to Belgrade in support of the team....
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon champion Andy Murray says he is unlikely to play in Britain's Davis Cup quarter-final clash in Serbia this weekend but could travel to Belgrade in support of the team.

headline.print_headline: Murray Likely to Miss Britain's Davis Cup Quarter-Final
headline.main: Murray Likely to Miss Britain's Davis Cup Quarter-Final
